item.description: Overview Soft Top Layer -- 600 Fill Power Duck Down Supportive Bottom Layer -- 95% Small Goose Feather/5% Goose Down Blend Fill Made in USA 100% Cotton Twill Fabric Baffle box construction Product Details The top layer of our Super Featherbed is like floating on a cloud, but with the cushiony support of small goose feathers once you sink in. The luxurious top layer is made of 600 Fill Power Duck Down and the supportive bottom layer is made of 95% Small Goose Feather/5% Goose Down Blend. A layer of cotton fabric is sewn between the two layers to keep the feathers from mixing with the down. Made with 100% cotton twill fabric. We recommend using a cotton Featherbed Cover, an extra layer of protection for your featherbed investment, with a fitted sheet over it. Care Instructions: Shake and fluff on a regular basis. Air outside to keep smelling fresh. Spot clean stains with a mild detergent. Thoroughly dry area with a hand held hair dryer. item.description: Overview Introductory Comforter Hypoallergenic 600 Fill Power European Duck Down Fill 233 Thread Count 100% Cotton Cambric Fabric Made in USA of fine imported materials Product Details Finally, a warm, light down comforter that's a great value, and made by hand! Our Primary Comforter is our basic, but that doesn't mean basic quality. Each one is stitched in our Portland, Maine factory, so we guarantee the quality is superior to the mass produced comforters on discount store shelves. We fill soft 233 thread count downproof 100% cotton fabric with our special 600 Fill Power European Duck Down from the cold regions of the French Pyrenees mountains. Box stitch construction for evenly distributed down and reinforced seams for a longer life. Our oversized comforters and our warmest level 3 and 4 comforters are made with interior baffles. Each comforter made in USA using fine imported materials. "A lightweight comforter that will keep you toasty." - Real Simple Care Instructions: Frequently shake to refresh down filling. Air outside to keep smelling fresh. Spot clean small stains with a mild detergent and completely dry area with a hand held hairdryer. Machine wash warm with our Fine Fabrics Wash or your preferred mild detergent. Dry completely on a low setting to prevent mildew. For best results commercial washing and drying is recommended. Frequent washing may cause shell to become less down proof. Size TWIN(68" x 86") Blanket: 13oz. Summer: 18oz. Level 1: 22oz. Level 2: 27oz. Level 3: 40oz. Level 4 : 54oz. We use box stitch construction for evenly distributed down and reinforced seams for a longer life. Our warmest level 3 and 4 comforters are made with interior baffles. Each comforter made in USA using fine imported materials. Care Instructions: Frequently shake to refresh down filling. Air outside to keep smelling fresh. Spot clean small stains with a mild detergent and completely dry area with a hand held hairdryer. Machine wash warm with our Fine Fabrics Wash or your preferred mild detergent. Dry completely on a low setting to prevent mildew. For best results commercial washing and drying is recommended. Frequent washing may cause shell to become less down proof. item.description: Overview 100% Cotton German Batiste Fabric Made in USA of fine imported materials Ultimate Comforter Ultra lightweight 350 Thread Count Hypoallergenic 900 Fill Power European White Goose Down Fill Product Details A delightfully warm down comforter that's so light you'll hardly know it's there! Our exclusive German Batiste is the world's lightest downproof fabric and we fill it with 900 Fill Power European White Goose Down - the most luxurious white goose down we have ever found. It's so rare we only have a limited amount and we recommend that you check for availability. Box stitch construction for evenly distributed down and reinforced seams for a longer life. Our oversized comforters are made with interior baffles. Each comforter made in USA using fine imported materials. Care Instructions: Frequently shake to refresh down filling. Air outside to keep smelling fresh. Spot clean small stains with a mild detergent and completely dry area with a hand held hairdryer. Machine wash warm with our Fine Fabrics Wash or your preferred mild detergent. Dry completely on a low setting to prevent mildew. For best results commercial washing and drying is recommended. item.description: Overview Ultimate Comforter Hypoallergenic Eiderdown Fill - the most prized down in the world Ultra lightweight 350 Thread Count 100% Cotton German Batiste Fabric Made in USA of fine imported materials Product Details Our German Batiste is the world's lightest downproof fabric, and we've paired it with Eiderdown, the world's most coveted down, for a down comforter from a class all its own. Eiderdown is prized worldwide for its matchless warmth and lightness. Collected by hand from abandoned nests in Iceland and Scandinavia, the annual world harvest is just four tons - truly one of nature's greatest treasures. Box stitch construction for evenly distributed down and reinforced seams for a longer life. Our oversized comforters and our warmest level 3 and 4 comforters are made with interior baffles. Dry completely on a low setting to prevent mildew. For best results commercial washing and drying is recommended. Frequent washing may cause shell to become less down proof.
